For induction general anesthesia ECT , patient receive either 1mg/kg methohexital ( standard arm ) 1.0 mg/kg IV ketamine ( experimental arm ) intravenously ( IV ) duration ECT index course 2-3 week . Secondary outcome change cognitive status assess Montreal Cognitive Assessment ( MoCA ) scale , quality seizure , change regional cerebral oximetry seizure , change serum metabolite ( include kynurenine , D/L-serine glutamate intermediate ) treatment , , need ECT course ( relapse ) within 1 year initial course .
